title: When It Grows Darkest
lyrics:
When you're out in the sticks
And you're all but lost
The sun is dead
In a world of frost
Follow Polaris
On the Northern route

When it grows darkest

The stars come out



They've beaten you down

And you can't get up

Stolen your horses

And they smashed your cup

Look up above

There can be no doubt

When it grows darkest

The stars come out



You harness the light

The lookout glows

Gather the children

And hold them close

And teach of love (teach of love)

And peace devout (and peace devout)

When it grows darkest

The stars come out



When it grows darkest

The stars come out

When it grows darkest

The stars come out



When it grows darkest

The stars come out

When it grows darkest

The stars come out



When it grows darkest

The stars come out
